sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-status-color-danger: #6b0022 !default; $pe-badge-danger: #a40034 !default; $pe-background-header-danger: #dd0047 !default; $pe-background-body-danger: #be003d !default; .incident-message { .badge { background-color: $pe-badge-danger; border-radius: 100px; float: right; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; height: 28px; margin-top: -5px; min-width: 76px; padding-top: 7px; text-transform: lowercase; } .panel { color: #fff; .panel-heading { border-bottom: 0; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; padding: 14px; text-transform: uppercase; } .panel-body { .status-circle-small-left { background: $pe-status-color-danger; border-radius: 10px; float: left; height: 10px; margin: 5px 10px 0 0; width: 10px; } } .panel-header-high-risk { background-color: $pe-background-header-danger; } .panel-body-high-risk { background-color: $pe-background-body-danger; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 400; padding-bottom: 5px; .status-message { font-weight: 100; margin-left: 20px; } } } }sp_instancetruepe-incident-messagefalse PE Incident Message[{ "name": "problem_number", "default_value": "SIR0001932", "label": "Problem Number", "type": "string" }]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-03-09 17:35:55truea1e0159fdbd93200b793f2b6ae9619bf453 PE Incident Messageglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_a1e0159fdbd93200b793f2b6ae9619bfsteven.gregory2017-09-21 19:38:55

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_47b23988dbd00700d8ebd65fdf9619fb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>PE Incident Message Service</name><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  'use strict';

  function timeService() {
    var service = {
      getTimeAgo: getTimeAgo
    };
    return service;

    function getTimeAgo(openedTime, serverDate) {
      var timeAgo = {};
      if (openedTime) {
        var today = new Date(serverDate);
        var problemTime = new Date(openedTime);
        var secondDiff = today - problemTime;
        timeAgo.days = Math.floor(secondDiff / 86400000);
        timeAgo.hours = Math.floor((secondDiff % 86400000) / 3600000);
        timeAgo.minutes = Math.round(((secondDiff % 86400000) % 3600000) / 60000);
      }
      return timeAgo;
    }
  }

  angular
    .module('pe-incident-message')
    .service('timeService', timeService);
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-26 20:57:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>47b23988dbd00700d8ebd65fdf9619fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PE Incident Message Service</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_47b23988dbd00700d8ebd65fdf9619fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-09-21 19:37:40</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
